content: gaming gloves by haulaway knits as with previous fingers co 6 sts pick up 3 stitches from the bottom of the previous finger k2 then k the last stitch together with the first stitch of the round k for 20 rounds repeat round 6 5 times bind off 16 sts r middle pick up the next 8 stitches from where they are held as before pick up 1 st from the bottom of the previous finger and ktog with the first st k the remaining 7 sts co 6 sts pick up 3 stitches from the bottom of the ring finger k2 and k the last stitch together with the first stitch of the round k around for 22 rounds repeat round 6 5 times bind off 16 sts r index pick up the last 8 sts from where they are held as before pick up 1 st from the bottom of the previous finger and ktog with the first st k the remaining 7 sts co 6 sts pick up 3 stitches from the bottom of the middle finger k2 and k the last stitch together with the first stitch of the round k around for 20 rounds repeat round 6 5 times bind off 16 sts 6 | page gaming gloves by haulaway knits r thumb pick up the 12 sts held for the thumb co 4 sts join in the round k 15 rounds repeat round 6 5 times bind off all 16 sts weave in your ends and you now have your own set of gloveless fingers special thanks to rosberry crafts for the additional pictures and test knit extra special thanks to taylor for modeling 7 | page
